name: Edgy-JSON
body:
Edgy-JSON is an alternative to [JSON Schema](http://json-schema.org/). If you want to introduce some potentially broken code into your project, you should use Edgy-JSON. If not, don't worry. Edgy-JSON will probably become mainstream one day, and I'll have moved on to some other bleeding-edge project.

# Install
    pip install edgy-json

# Use
    import edgy
    edgy.check(schema, data)

# Documentation
The future hasn't arrived yet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
